channel.title: Authors on Pierre Ramet
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pierre Ramet

item.description: Pierre Ramet is an assistant professor in computer science at Bordeaux University. His interests span high-performance computing, focusing on sparse linear algebra. He leads the team in charge of developing PaStiX, a high-performance sparse direct solver. Research team: HiePACS ANR supports: SOLARIS (CE46) SASHIMI (JCJC18) SOLHAR (MN13) ANEMOS (MN11) PETALH (MN10) PETAL (COS08) SOLSTICE (CIS06) ASTER (CIS06) NUMASIS (CIS05) Industrial partners: CEA Cesta (DAM) CEA Cadarache (ITER) EDF TOTAL AIRBUS CERFACS ALGO’TECH Associate teams with:
